bibliographic-data.invention-title: PRODUCTS AND PROCESSES FOR REVENUE SHARING AND DELIVERY

nplcit.text: Aamer, A. M. (2005). Suppliers evaluation and selection: A comprehensive model to minimize the risk associated with quality and delivery. (Order No. 3197591, The University of Tennessee). ProQuest Dissertations and Theses, , 189-189 p. Retrieved 11 February 2014

abstract.p: Various techniques of distributing revenue and/or other money, selecting/bonding delivery agents, and performing other tasks are providing herein. Methods include distributing portions of loan payments to one or more referrers associated with one or more loans, bonding of delivery agents, selecting delivery agents, allocating portions of credit card payments and/or sharing advertisement revenue. Other apparatus and methods are disclosed.
